definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: nip, nip off (head of bird; without necessarily severing it fr. body, cf. Le 5:8) (NH id., Aram. [[מְלַק]],mlag);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וּמָלַק אֶת־ראׁשׁוֹ]] Le 1:15, i.e. head of dove; cf. [[וּמָלַק אֶת־ראׁשׁוֹ מִמּוּל עָרְפּוֹ וְלאׁ יַבְדִּיל]] Le 5:8. Cf. Di-Ry. LXX a)pokni/zw.
